column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Why do n't you get right down to business and tell me what 's been bothering you . "
#Text=Aang says : " You know what 's bothering me .
#Text=Why are you so afraid of him ?
#Text=" Aang says : " You said it yourself !
#Text=He 's the baddest man on the planet !
#Text=I 'm supposed to defeat him and save the world !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Life does feel that way sometimes , does n't it ?
#Text=Like we 're all trying to save the world from evil .
#Text=But what can I do to feel better ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Want to try screaming into this pillow ?
